alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 18 at 7:50PM MST until February 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From late Saturday morning through late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers, with a risk for blow overs.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph...or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
